1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Umm Habibah bint Jahsh said:"I used to bleed continuously and heavily. I went to the Prophet asking him for advice and telling him (about my situation). I found him with my sister Zainab and said: 'o Messenger of Allah! I need to ask you something.' He said: 'What is it?' I said: 'I bleed continuously and heavily, and that is keeping me from prayer and fasting. What do you command me to do about it?' He said: 'I advise you to use a piece of cotton, for that will take away the blood.' I said: 'It is more than that.'" And he mentioned something like the Hadith of Sharik (below)

chapter.ara-name: باب ما جاء في المستحاضة التي قد عدت أيام أقرائها قبل أن يستمر بها الدم
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the non-menstrually bleeding woman who has counted the days of her period before her flow of blood became continuous
